short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Maps to google search results and redirects to search for phrase in Google Maps site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simply adds the "Maps" tab back in the google result search page for European users. 

Based on user input in google search bar, the "Maps" tab redirects to Google Maps with the searched phrase and shows searched places. 

This extension operates without collecting any user data - ensures users privacy, and security. 

For more information please contact.
